alert.note: Alert for Koochiching (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 7:09PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Koochiching County through 745 PM CDT... At 709 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 15 miles west of Big Falls, to near Margie, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Big Falls around 715 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Littlefork, Loman and Pelland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for north central Minnesota.
